Text:
Yay! Hard Coded subs! It's been ages since I've been able to watch a foreign film on my Xbox :D

As usual:
A/10
V/10
Good upload been wanting to see this for some time now. Yahoo! thanx HR! hope since subs are hardcoded should work fine with ps3.

THanks...
Please upload 28 days later, Ben Hur & THe Cleopatra...
thanks for upload. i wish they all had hard coded subs
I hope non of the uploads have hardcoded subtitles

Hard coded subs sucks ass. The CHD 1080p remux/encode release also include those. I wonder if it's in the BD release itself. When the movie itself is not in English, I prefer subs in my native language. Also the placing and coloring for these hard coded's are dead wrong.
I think there is not yet any clean version of this film all of them have the hard coded crap

Atsaluum: The blu-ray itself did in fact have hardcoded subs, so the release group isn't to blame for them.

http://forum.blu-ray.com/blu-ray-movies-north-america/173095-biutiful-javier-bardem-may-31st-2.html
Thanks HR.... !!! Smashed it once again :  )
Ur work is Amazing really ...thank you for all ur hard work to give us great movies...
